name: Undergraduate enrollment in engineering programs, by sex, enrollment status, ethnicity, race, and citizenship: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Race or ethnicity breakouts are for U.S. citizens and permanent residents only. Temporary resident includes all racial and ethnic groups. Data are based on degree-granting institutions eligible to participate in Title IV federal financial aid programs.
sources: Department of Education, National Center for Education Statistics, Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System, Fall Enrollment Survey, unrevised provisional release data, accessed 14 February 2020.
